snippet.title: Gaiadon - Transcendence update (0.8a)
snippet.description:
Gaiadon: Eternal Quest is an incremental/idle RPG. Embark on a thrilling journey through the realm of Gaiadon and its continents. Battle monsters, collect loot, upgrade your gear, ascend, find skill books, complete fame trials, add heroes to your arsenal. 

Features:

Equipment - Level and upgrade your equipment through various tiers.
Ascension - Prestige to gain more stats.
Pets - Collect and upgrade pets dropped from defeated enemies.
Continents - Unlock and progress through the various continents of Gaiadon.
Boss hunt - Defeat Demons and the mighty Titans.
Fame - Complete trials and increase your renown through Gaiadon.
Heroes - Gather heroes to join your fight in Gaiadon.
Skills - Skill Trainer produces skill points for you to learn new active and passive skills.
Corrupted Domains - New Game mode, unlocks its secrets.


This incremental RPG is in early access, with exciting new features on the horizon.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3000030/Gaiadon_Eternal_Quest/
Discord: https://discord.gg/t6me7v4rn7
